WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 28 DEC THRU 02 JAN 18
   BY M/V ARTEMIS ANGLER TOWING SIX 160 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BETWEEN
   24-24.00S 24-51.00S AND 042-01.13W 042-24.10W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 4164/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 03 JAN 18.
